item.title: [GRA1][Virtual Private Servers] - Rack G122A11
item.description:
Nov 6, 11:46 UTC
Resolved - Start time : 06/11/2024 10:07 UTC
End time : 06/11/2024 10:58 UTC
Root cause : Electrical disjunction
We would like to inform you that the incident have been resolved and the situation is back to normal.

We thank you for your understanding and patience throughout this incident

Nov 6, 10:49 UTC
Update - We are continuing to investigate this issue.

Nov 6, 10:42 UTC
Update - We are continuing to investigate this issue.

Nov 6, 10:39 UTC
Update - We are continuing to investigate this issue.

Nov 6, 10:24 UTC
Investigating - An incident is in progress on our Bare Metal offer. It has temporarily affected the "Availability/Functionality/Latency".

We are actively working to resolve this problem.

Our teams are fully mobilized and we will keep you informed of developments and the resolution of the incident.

We apologize for the inconvenience and thank you for your understanding.

Here is detail for this incident :

Start time : 06/11/2024 10:07 UTC
Service impact : A significant number of VPS Instances in the rack G122A11 are unreachable.
Ongoing actions : Our teams are investigating to determine the origin of the incident and fix it.
Update will be posted as significant progress is made.

item.description:
Nov 6, 04:23 UTC
Resolved - Start time : 06/11/2024 03:22 UTC
End time : 06/11/2024 04:22 UTC
Root cause : This incident was due to network equipment malfunction.
We would like to inform you that the incident have been resolved and the situation is back to normal.

We thank you for your understanding and patience throughout this incident

Nov 6, 04:02 UTC
Update - Update : The vRack network are temporarily unavailable since 03:50 UTC.
The issue has been identified and a fix is being implemented.
Update will be posted as significant progress is made.

Nov 6, 03:54 UTC
Identified - The issue has been identified and a fix is being implemented.

Nov 6, 03:28 UTC
Investigating - An incident is in progress on our Bare Metal offer. It has temporarily affected the functionality.


We are actively working to resolve this problem.

Our teams are fully mobilized and we will keep you informed of developments and the resolution of the incident.


We apologize for the inconvenience and thank you for your understanding.


Here is detail for this incident :

Start time : 06/11/2024 03:22 UTC
Service impact : vRack network is currently unstable for servers in rack R715B04.
Ongoing actions : Our teams are investigating to determine the origin of the incident and fix it.
Update will be posted as significant progress is made.
